title: 104_hr2173
content: Medicare Physician Ownership and Referral Amendments of 1995 - Makes modifications under the Medicare program under title XVIII of the Social Security Act to the general exceptions to both ownership and compensation arrangement prohibitions with respect to physician referrals. Excepts shared facility services from such referral prohibitions. Revises exceptions for certain other compensation arrangements as well. Excludes intraocular lens, eyeglasses, and contact lenses from designated health services subject to such prohibitions.
